law.catch_line: A corrective order issued under this subtitle shall:...

text.section:
Each corrective order issued under this subtitle shall be in writing and shall be served:
As a summons is served under the Maryland Rules; or
By certified mail.
Unless the person charged with a corrective order requests a hearing within 10 days after service, the corrective order becomes a final order.

If the person charged with a corrective order makes a timely request for a hearing under subsection (c) of this section, the Secretary shall:
Hold a hearing within 20 days after the request is made; and
Give the person written notice of the date, time, and place of the hearing, at least 10 days before the hearing date.
